Lavorare in BIP Ã¨ un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti.
column11:
Challenging yourself

Avrai la possibilitÃ  di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attivitÃ  e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, lâ€™autonomia e la capacitÃ  di assumerti responsabilitÃ  e metterti in gioco.

Unlocking your potential

Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi allâ€™avanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.

Work-life Integration

Troverai una policy che supporta
column12: lo smartworking&nbsp
column13:
fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration.

Diversity, Equity &
column14:
Inclusion

Valorizziamo lâ€™unicitÃ  e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutti i dipendenti abbiano pari opportunitÃ  di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro.

Il nostro approccio alla diversitÃ  e allâ€™inclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integritÃ  e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, piÃ¹ ampi.

Promuoviamo lâ€™inserimento e lâ€™integrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette â€“ in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99 â€“.

Next Steps

Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prenderemo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.

Se câ€™Ã¨ un match con questa o con altre posizioni aperte allâ€™interno del Gruppo, ti contatteremo per iniziare la nostra conoscenza reciproca.

Lâ€™iter di selezione comprende generalmente un colloquio con HR, un colloquio tecnico con un line manager ed un eventuale colloquio con un Partner.

Lâ€™ordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di recruiting.

In alternativa, saremo felici di conservare il tuo CV nel nostro database per poterlo rivalutare per altre opportunitÃ  future.

Se dovessi identificare ulteriori posizioni di tuo interesse ed in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente.

4124125028,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/remote-data-contributor-no-experience-needed-at-transperfect-4124125028?position=2&pageNum=5&refId=3pwJIshkWi50nczsb5QcKw%3D%3D&trackingId=2AjAjqmdTHPmRP5BOcLYNA%3D%3D,Remote Data Contributor - No Experience Needed,TransPerfect,"Latium, Italy","Position: Data Contributor
Project Location: Remote from Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, or Switzerland.
Engagement Model: One-time task, task based
We are currently looking for contributors to participate in our Wharf remote project!

This project aims at collecting text messages, emails, and emails with attachments that you have received for booking confirmations, changes, or cancellations related to Belgium and Switzerland within the past 2 years.
The collection purpose is to help improve and test features, services, and algorithms by training advanced machine learning systems such as neural networks and generative models.
You will receive $3.5 USD per each accepted asset, via PayPal, Gift Card or Wire Transfer, according to your preference.

Using our DataForce proprietary platform, you will share assets (text messages, emails, and emails with attachments) from your personal computer (desktop or laptop) or mobile device, according to the instructions that will be shared with you if you qualify for the project.
You can submit as many assets as you wish for the open categories.
You can submit personal text messages, emails, and emails with attachments in German, French, or Italian from a variety of categories:
Travel: Flights, Hotels, Car rentals, Ticketed ground transport (e.g., train, bus, ferry)
Entertainment: Tickets for movies, shows, sports and other events, Party invitations originating from event providers

Appointments: Doctor appointments, dentist appointments, personal care appointments (e.g., oral hygienist, physical therapist, etc.), appointments for family members (e.g., childrenâ€™s doctor appointments).
Our team will identify and remove any personal information (e.g., your name) contained in your assets before they are used in our project.
If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at: DataForce.Sourcing@transperfect.com

DataForce by TransPerfect is part of the TransPerfect family of companies, the worldâ€™s largest provider of language and technology solutions for global business, with offices in more than 100 cities worldwide.

We offer high-quality data for Human-Machine Interaction to some of the most prestigious technology companies in the world. Our division focuses on gathering, enriching and processing data for Machine Learning in different AI domains.
To learn more about DataForce please visit us at https://www.transperfect.com/dataforce

Position: Data Contributor

Project Location: Remote from Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, or Switzerland.

Engagement Model: One-time task, task based


We are currently looking for contributors to participate in our Wharf remote project!


What is the project about?

This project aims at collecting text messages, emails, and emails with attachments that you have received for booking confirmations, changes, or cancellations related to Belgium and Switzerland within the past 2 years.


The collection purpose is to help improve and test features, services, and algorithms by training advanced machine learning systems such as neural networks and generative models.


Compensation

You will receive $3.5 USD per each accepted asset, via PayPal, Gift Card or Wire Transfer, according to your preference.


Task Description

Using our DataForce proprietary platform, you will share assets (text messages, emails, and emails with attachments) from your personal computer (desktop or laptop) or mobile device, according to the instructions that will be shared with you if you qualify for the project.

You can submit as many assets as you wish for the open categories.


You can submit personal text messages, emails, and emails with attachments in German, French, or Italian from a variety of categories:

  • Travel: Flights, Hotels, Car rentals, Ticketed ground transport (e.g., train, bus, ferry)
column2: • Entertainment: Tickets for movies, shows, sports and other events, Party invitations originating from event providers
column3:
• Appointments: Doctor appointments, dentist appointments, personal care appointments (e.g., oral hygienist, physical therapist, etc.), appointments for family members (e.g., childrenâ€™s doctor appointments).


    • Our team will identify and remove any personal information (e.g., your name) contained in your assets before they are used in our project.


    If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at: DataForce.Sourcing@transperfect.com


    ***

    DataForce by TransPerfect is part of the TransPerfect family of companies, the worldâ€™s largest provider of language and technology solutions for global business, with offices in more than 100 cities worldwide.

    We offer high-quality data for Human-Machine Interaction to some of the most prestigious technology companies in the world. Our division focuses on gathering, enriching and processing data for Machine Learning in different AI domains.

    To learn more about DataForce please visit us at https://www.transperfect.com/dataforce

The chance to build a better future is right in front of you
Do Work That Matters - Your Role And Responsibilities

Do you want to do work that truly makes an impact? At KPMG, you will have the opportunity to help clients, society, and your colleagues tackle and solve todayâ€™s most pressing and complex challenges. KPMG Advisory provides consulting services to companies, supporting them in transforming their business models, improving and digitizing processes, analyzing and managing risks, and assisting with extraordinary financial operations.

By joining the Enterprise Platform Team, you will be involved in managing business transformation processes. Together with experienced colleagues, you will analyze strategic requirements to implement the best digital solutions on the market for integrated process management.
Analyze business requirements and design advanced Business Intelligence solutions using SAS VIYA, Power BI, and other data analysis tools.
Support the technical team in resolving SAS-related issues, ensuring quality and reliability of solutions.
Develop reports and dashboards with SAS Visual Analytics, optimizing processes and enhancing business efficiency.
Collaborate with team members and clients to collect data, define objectives, and implement improvement strategies.
